original_title: จะใหญ่ จะย่อ ก็พ่อเรา
overview: When Fahfad stayed in scout camp, he disrespect the nymph. In return, he was cursed and given the pills whic can reduce human age. He decides to give it to his father. His father’s mistress plan to abduct the child and demand ransom. After that, the story was haywire.
title: Hey Daddy
